details.detail: Honesty is a natural way of being and its absence in daily life will only lead to ruin. I strive to operate with honesty and transparency in the forefront of my mind.
I develop genuine care about the people I choose to work with and want the best for them and the people they care about. I like to frame my work around how I can help improve the lives of others.
I believe practicing humility leads to more openness and honesty which leads to better understanding of eachother which leads to tighter collaboration and better everything.
Better understanding and operating with humility requires empathetic mindfulness.
